subject: Handbrake Elastomer measurement
description_text:
Hi,
What is the length of the red elastomer on the "Simsonn Racing Simulator
Pressure Handbrake?" Is this the same elastomer as on the HB pro handbrake
and can I interchange it with a harder elastomer from my simsonn pro x
ultra pedals? Thanks.
Regards,
Tom

conversations.body_text: Hi Thomas Morrison,    They are interchangeable, so there's no need to worry.

?

Thomas reacted via Gmail
